snippet.title: Funulous Caveman Official Trailer
snippet.description:
A fascinating world of adventure and dinosaurs ! 

Google Play : http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.funulous.funulouscaveman

Explore an amusing platformer with 100 thrilling levels and 7 different worlds where you overcome unique challenges to reach your dream island 🌴 ❕

Enjoy running 🐾 , jumping, diving ⚓ , swinging on vines, eating watermelons 🍉 and collecting coins 💰 ❕

Bypass dangerous dinosaurs, alligators, savage fishes 🐡 , spikes and mysterious enemies 🗿 ❕

Bounce on mammoths 🐘 , fountains 🐳 , trampoline-plants 🍀 and get thrown in the air by ballistic coconut trees 🌴 ❕

Have fun riding dinosaurs, climbing giraffes and smashing fruits 🍍 ❕

📌 Features :

✅ Amazing graphics 🎨 and mesmerizing sound effects 🎶 ❕

✅ 100 Unique and challenging levels ❕

✅ 7 Wonderful worlds : Island 🌴 , Volcano 🌋 , Ice ❄ , Underwater ⚓, Stone 🗻, Sand 🌵 , OnClouds ⛅ ❕

✅ Plentiful dinosaurs, fun animals 🐙 and amusing challenges ❕

✅ Beautiful cavewomen 💘 , abundant fruits, delicious meat 🍖 and warming fire 🔥 ❕

✅ Emmersive experience :  optional vibration ♒ ❕

✅ Awesome customisations 🔧 : lots of hats 👑 , weapons, power-ups ⚡🆙 and dinosaurs to ride ❕

✅ 100% free store ❕

✅ Optional game services  : cloud saving ☁ , achievements and leaderboards 🏆 ❕

✅ For the hardcore gamers 🎮 : the game has the hardest achievements and leaderboards 🏆 you will ever find; old school real challenges like completing the game in 1 go ❕

✅ Insanely optimized 🚀 : in disc, battery, memory and processor usage ❕

✅ Supports all devices 💯 : phones and tablets, including the very old ones so No child left behind ❕

Enjoy ❕

🔎 Social media :

🔗 https://www.facebook.com/Funulous/

🔗 https://twitter.com/funulous
